column3: I know how to hold a grudge
column4: I can send a bridge up in smoke
column5: And I can't count the people I've let down,, the hearts I've broke
column6: You ain't gotta dig too deep
column7: If you wanna find some dirt on me
column9: Ain't who you've got to be
column10: It's gonna be an uphill climb
column15: I still got a few more dances with the devil
column16: Im cleaning up my act little by little
column18: I can finally stand the man in the mirror I see
column19: I aint as good as Im gonna get
column20: But Im better than I used to be
column23: Ive pinned a lot of demons to the ground

column26: Standing in the rain so long has left me with a little rust
column27: But put some faith in me
column29: Theres a diamond under all this dust
